name: Cuddle Coddle
description:
In response to a variety of recent events and for advocation of inclusion and greater community in the games industry, this game was made as part of the 24-hour Game Jam on "Love" with the University of Southern California's Makers of Entertaining Games Association on November 14th, 2014.

This is a game made by Napoleon Martinez (me), Alex Ogorek, and Chengyu Fu w/ sound by Nelson Thomas.

The controls are with the arrow keys to move. The goal is to raise your chicks to adulthood while making sure they are happy until then. Collect hearts and then fly over and give them to your chicks with the spacebar!
